p: At laboratory diagnosis, detection of neutralization antibody to IBAV and virus isolation from diseased cattle are usually tested ( 41, 43â€“ 46). IBAV-specific RT-PCR based on segment 2 is available to detect the virus from infected cattle ( 46). A real-time RT-PCR assay for typing of EHDV would be able to detect the presence of IBAV in diagnostic samples ( 49). Currently, commercial attenuated and killed vaccines to IBAV are prepared in Japan ( 50, 51).
